title: SUPERSINGULAR CURVES WITH SMALL NON-INTEGER ENDOMORPHISMS
abstract: Abstract. We introduce a special class of supersingular curves over Fp2, characterised by the existence of non-integer endomorphisms of small degree. A number of properties of this set is proved. Most notably, we show that when this set partitions into subsets in such a way that curves within each subset have small-degree isogenies between them, but curves in distinct subsets have no small-degree isogenies between them. Despite this, we show that isogenies between these curves can be computed eﬃciently, giving a technique for computing isogenies between certain prescribed curves that cannot be reasonably connected by searching on ℓ-isogeny graphs.
keywords: charakterized by non-integer endomorphisms of small degree
